name: House Flipper City
description:
House Flipper City gives you a unique chance to create your own real estate business.
Buy devastated flats, houses and commercial premises all around the city.



Repair broken and damaged properties.
There are different variations of finish, choose them carefully not everyone can afford
luxury.


In a massive city of House Flipper, you need to manage your properties.
Selling them it's one way to make money, but the good businessman knows there are many
different possibilities.
What about renting them to make easy profit each month?


Budget management its a part of our everyday life but can you estimate your profit and find the best
investments out there? Will you succeed?



Real estate business is not a piece of cake.
Improve your skills, get better each month and become King of a City.
Will you become the richest or will you fail? It's all up to you, but most importantly HAVE
FUN!
